EmailTemplate.description: IN USE Email sent to the Application Owner when PO or FO rejects the application.
EmailTemplate.name: Application rejection email to owner
EmailTemplate.subject: Notification: Application #{!Application__c.Name} has been Rejected
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Subject: Notification that the Application # {!Application__c.Name} has been Rejected.
Hello {!Application__c.OwnerFirstName},
This email is to notify you that your Application # {!Application__c.Name} for the Funding Opportunity {!Application__c.AnnouncementNumber__c}has been Rejected.
Please do not reply to this email. You may contact the GovGrants Support Team at govgrants@support.com if you have any questions or need assistance with this task.
Sincerely
EGMS Team
